history.name: 23shout
history.description:
The second startup I've founded; funded by Skalata Ventures.

It's a phone system for modern teams. No installs required; your team can make and receive calls in minutes from their own devices.

history.name: Clipchamp
history.description:
A video editing platform that allows users to edit videos in the browser.

I was an early stage hire that worked on the core editor experience, later worked almost exclusively on the timeline and its development.

history.name: mimetype.io
history.description: A fun side project, mimetype.io now receives over 10,000+ unique visits per month from purely organic Google search results.
